Comment: Trump will never be able to live up to the terrible Nixon. At least Nixon did things like:  - Founding the EPA - Title IX (Women in sports) - First President to give Native Americans the right to tribal self-determination by ending the policy of forced assimilation and returning their sacred lands. - First President to visit People’s Republic of China.  Dear god, please do not take this as my approval of Nixon - just to show how far right US politics have shifted.
Author: no_kids-and-3_money

Comment: It's the same old cycle that we're seeing here...  Republicans come into office, and the economy inevitably tanks.  Democrats come into office, spend all their time repairing GOPonomic damage.  The difference here, is that GOPs are doing their damnedest to make sure Dems can't repair the damage this time.
